#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int k;

int prefix(string s, int sub_len) {
	vector<int> p(s.length() + 1);
	p[0] = 0;
	for(int i = 1; i < s.length(); i++) {
		int j = p[i-1];
		while(j > 0 && s[i] != s[j]) {
			j = p[j - 1];
		}
		if(s[i] == s[j]) {
			p[i] = j + 1;
		} else {
			p[i] = 0;
		}
	}
	int cnt = 0;
	for(int i = sub_len; i < s.length(); i++){
		if(p[i] == sub_len) {
			cnt++;
		}
	} 
	return cnt;
}


int main() {
	int len;
	
	cin>>len;
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	
	cin>>k;
	
	int l = 0;
	int r = len;
	int t = 500;
	int ans = 0;
	
	while(t-- && l <= r) {
		int mid = (l + r) / 2;
		string sub = s.substr(0, mid);
		int sub_len = sub.length();
		sub += '#';
		sub += s;
		int x = prefix(sub, sub_len);
		if(x >= k) {
			ans = mid;
			l = mid + 1;
		} else {
			r = mid - 1;
		}
		
	}
	cout<<ans<<"\n";
	cout<<s.substr(0, ans)<<"\n";
	return 0;
}
